title: S5 Ep9: The lockdown supply shock
itunes:title: The lockdown supply shock
description: China's Covid lockdown in early 2020 shocked the business world. How did this surprise disruption affect the firms that rely on imported Chinese products? Isabelle Mejean tells Tim Phillips about the economic impact in France, and which firms were most resilient.Â
